snippet: China contradicted Japan’s account of the latest close encounters between military aircraft, further escalating tensions between the two countries.
abstract: China's Ministry of National Defense accuses Japan of airborne brinkmanship over East China Sea, rejecting Tokyo's account of latest close encounters between military aircraft from two increasingly estranged countries.
lead_paragraph: China contradicted Japan’s account of the latest close encounters between military aircraft, further escalating tensions between the two countries.

headline.main: China Calls Japan the Aggressor in Flybys Over Sea
headline.print_headline: China Calls Japan the Aggressor in Flybys Over Sea
